cosc345.app.model

Class Grader

  • java.lang.Object
    • cosc345.app.model.Grader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FFT.FFTResultListener

    public class Grader
extends java.lang.Object
implements FFT.FFTResultListener
    The Grader class takes a sequence of notes, gets the user to sing those notes, and gives a grade based on how close what the user's singing was compared to the original sequence of notes.

      • onFFTResult

        public void onFFTResult(double frequency,
                        double amplitude,
                        double averageFrequency,
                        double[] recentFrequencies)
        Description copied from interface: FFT.FFTResultListener
        Method that receives the most recent results from the FFT thread.
        Specified by:
        onFFTResult in interface FFT.FFTResultListener
        Parameters:
        frequency - the most recent frequency reading.
        amplitude - the most recent amplitude reading.
        averageFrequency - the moving average of the recent frequency readings.
        recentFrequencies - the recent frequency readings.
